title: CHRONOLOGICAL  ORDER IN BOARDS
body:
Well, many people are complaining that the new boards are too much like reddit which they hate... 

So here's something which helps make more boards more bearable for those who cant stand the new formatting...

You can change the boards to view threads in chronological order. This makes the threads feel somewhat the same as the old forums.

I just thought this might help! :D

replies.body: I did this the very moment Boards came out.
Yeh its much better  in chronological order.
